wiki-page.author: admin
wiki-page.content: 1 Iterations #set($i=$trackerService.queryWorkItems("project.id:$page.project AND HAS_VALUE:initialEstimate ","id").iterator()) #if($i.hasNext()) #set($d = $i.next().initialEstimate) #end #macro(sprint $s )#set($sprintId = $s.id)#set($stats = $s.getStatistics())$s.name ($s.dueDate)| $!s.status.name | #if($d)$!d.fromHours($!s.capacity)#else $!s.capacity#end| $stats.plannedAsString() | $stats.todoAsString()| $stats.doneAsString() ($stats.progressAsString()) #end #set($plans=$trackerService.getPlanningManager().searchPlans("project.id:$page.space.projectId AND NOT isTemplate:true AND template.id:iteration ","startDate",-1)) {table:width=100%} Iteration | Status | Team Capacity | Planned Work | Remaining Work | Done Work #foreach($t in $plans) #if($t.finishedOn)#set($t=$t.getFinishedPlan())#end #sprint($t)   #end {table}
